page.title: 19Worlingworth Playtime Games
page.content: Apple Apple is a school playground game for any number of children.2 children hold the rope,1 child skips & every- body sings,"Apple apple my sweetheart, tell me the name of your sweetheart". The singers then chant the alphabet until the skipper stops.He or she is then asked to choose the name of a person of the opposite sex begining with that letter.The skipping conti- nues to the song,"___ ___ come to tea ___ ___ marry me,yes,no,yes,no,etc.The word on wich the skipper stops determines his/her marriage prospects. Ickle Ockle Blue Bottle.We all put our feet in a circle.1 player chants"Ickle Ockle Blue Bottle,Ickle Ockle out" & touches the feet in turn.The person who gets "out"is the next person in the centre.
